item.title: Seaborn test
item.description: Markdown 단축키 M 함수 단축키 A Goal the course is aimed at those with no prior programming experience. each chart uses short and simple code, making seaborn much faster and easier to use than many other data visualization tools (such as Excel, for instance). import pandas as pd pd.plotting.register_matplotlib_converters() ## 뭐지? import matplotlib.pyplot as plt ## %가 뭐지 %matplotlib inline import seaborn as sns filepath = 'D:/git_local_repository/yangoos57/kaggle/courses/Data Visualization/Data_set/' fifa_data = pd.
